alert.note: Alert for Jackson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 23 at 9:24PM MDT until June 23 at 10:30PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM MDT FOR CENTRAL JACKSON COUNTY... At 924 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles northwest of Intersection of Highway 73 and White River, or 9 miles west of Kadoka, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Jackson County. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 138 and 144. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight MDT for southwestern South Dakota. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
